name: Flags
description: The Flags contract. Allows flags to signal to any reader on the access control list. The owner can set flags, or designate other addresses to set flags. The owner must turn the flags off, other setters cannot. An expected pattern is to allow addresses to raise flags on themselves, so if you are subscribing to FlagOn events you should filter for addresses you care about.

eventDecorators.name: AddedAccess
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: CheckAccessDisabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: CheckAccessEnabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: FlagLowered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: FlagRaised
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferRequested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: RaisingAccessControllerUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

eventDecorators.name: RemovedAccess
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a user sells wTokens to the AMM. triggered when the system balance for a given token is updated.

functionDecorators.name: acceptOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

functionDecorators.name: addAccess
functionDecorators.description: Adds an address to the access list.

functionDecorators.name: getFlag
functionDecorators.description: read the warning flag status of a contract address.

parameterDecorators.name: subject
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address being checked for a flag.

returnDecorators.description: A true value indicates that a flag was raised and a false value indicates that no flag was raised.

functionDecorators.name: getFlags
functionDecorators.description: read the warning flag status of a contract address.

parameterDecorators.name: subjects
parameterDecorators.description: An array of addresses being checked for a flag.

returnDecorators.description: An array of bools where a true value for any flag indicates that a flag was raised and a false value indicates that no flag was raised.

functionDecorators.name: hasAccess
functionDecorators.description: Returns the access of an address.

functionDecorators.name: lowerFlags
functionDecorators.description: allows owner to disable the warning flags for multiple addresses.

parameterDecorators.name: subjects
parameterDecorators.description: List of the contract addresses whose flag is being lowered.

functionDecorators.name: raiseFlag
functionDecorators.description: enable the warning flag for an address. Access is controlled by raisingAccessController, except for owner who always has access.

parameterDecorators.name: subject
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address whose flag is being raised.

functionDecorators.name: raiseFlags
functionDecorators.description: enable the warning flags for multiple addresses. Access is controlled by raisingAccessController, except for owner who always has access.

parameterDecorators.name: subjects
parameterDecorators.description: List of the contract addresses whose flag is being raised.

functionDecorators.name: removeAccess
functionDecorators.description: Removes an address from the access list.

functionDecorators.name: setRaisingAccessController
functionDecorators.description: allows owner to change the access controller for raising flags.

parameterDecorators.name: racAddress
parameterDecorators.description: new address for the raising access controller.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.
